title: Srimad Bhagavatam - Canto 1 Chapter 2 | Adult Quiz (25Q)

questions.prompt: 1. SB 1.2.6 states that the supreme occupation for all humanity is that which:
choices: Awakens loving devotional service to the Lord
questions.feedback: Pure devotional service is the highest dharma.

questions.prompt: 2. According to SB 1.2.7, devotional service must be causeless and uninterrupted to:
questions.feedback: Only pure devotion fully satisfies the self.
